title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer is currently storing the absolute path. For example, <property name="fileName">/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when a library is included in a report design. For example, if the report design is in $project/test, the relative path should be used.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the BIRT designer
2. Create or open a report design
3. Add a library to the report design
4. Save the report design
Expected behavior:
The library include should store the relative path instead of the absolute path.
